thread.section_title: Coronation Street star Adam Rickitt joins Hollyoaks as Nancy Osborne’s ex – Metro
thread.title: Coronation Street star Adam Rickitt joins Hollyoaks as Nancy Osborne’s ex
thread.title_full: Coronation Street star Adam Rickitt joins Hollyoaks as Nancy Osborne’s ex

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street star Adam Rickitt joins Hollyoaks as Nancy Osborne’s ex
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Hollyoaks fans are about to welcome a familiar soap face to the village as Adam Rickitt, best known for playing Nick Tilsley before Ben Price took over the role in Coronation Street, has joined as Nancy Osborne’s ex, Kyle. 
Adam, who also starred in Shortland Street, made a bid to be an MP, had a pop career and recently spoke to Metro.co.uk about supporting an anti cyber bullying campaign, will make his debut next month when Nancy attends an MS support group.
It turns out that Kyle lives with the condition but as the pair get reacquainted and do their best to support one another, will Darren end up getting pushed out?
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Adam enthused: ‘I am really happy to be joining Hollyoaks. I’ve had a lot of friends work on the show throughout the years and they’ve all told me what an amazing place it is to work so it’s really good to be a part of such a welcoming crowd.

‘The key interest for me was in the storylines lined up for Kyle. I think they are amazing, taking the character on a real journey and something I am really enjoying playing a part in. Fingers crossed the audience like the surprises as they keep coming.’
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Could Kyle even have links to others in the village? Nothing is straight forward in Hollyoaks…
MORE: Hollyoaks spoilers: Wedding joy turns to tragedy as Amy Barnes dies
